mapper.select: SELECT RES_NO, RES_DATE, RES_TIME, 0 AS RES_PEOPLE, -- 만약 RES_PEOPLE이 TBL_RESERVATION에 없다면 0으로 반환 '' AS STORE_NAME, -- 만약 STORE_NAME이 없다면 빈 문자열 반환 STORE_NO FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
SELECT STORE_NO , STORE_NAME , STORE_DES , STORE_ADDRESS , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , STORE_PROFILE , STORE_MENU , STORE_CATEGORY_NO , USER_NO , POS_NUMBER FROM TBL_STORE WHERE USER_NO = #{storeNo}
SELECT r.RES_NO, r.RES_DATE, r.RES_TIME, r.IS_RANDOM, r.USER_NO, r.STORE_NO, r.QR_CONFIRM, r.QR FROM TBL_RESERVATION r WHERE r.STORE_NO = #{storeNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS WEEKLY_RESERVATION_COUNT FROM TBL_RESERVATION r WHERE r.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND YEARWEEK(r.RES_DATE, 1) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TODAY_RESERVATION_COUNT FROM TBL_RESERVATION r WHERE r.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND r.RES_DATE = CURDATE()

SELECT DISTINCT A.OPER_TIME AS operTime, IFNULL(B.RES_POS_NUMBER, A.POS_NUMBER) - IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_RESERVATION A_2 WHERE A.STORE_NO = A_2.STORE_NO AND A.OPER_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(A_2.RES_TIME, '%H:%i') ), 0) AS resPosNumber FROM ${day} A LEFT JOIN TBL_RES_POS_NUMBER B ON A.STORE_NO = B.STORE_NO AND A.OPER_TIME = DATE_FORMAT(B.R_OPER_TIME, '%H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(B.R_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{date} WHERE A.STORE_NO = #{storeNo};
SELECT * FROM TBL_REVIEW WHERE STORE_NO = #{ storeNo } ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT A.STORE_NO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_REVIEW WHERE STORE_NO = A.STORE_NO ) AS REVIEW_COUNT , A.REVIEW_NO , A.REVIEW_CONTENT , A.REVIEW_IMG , A.REVIEW_DATE , A.REVIEW_SCOPE , A.USER_NO , B.USER_NAME , B.USER_PROFILE , A.REPORT_COUNT , A.RES_NO FROM TBL_REVIEW A JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE A.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC;

SELECT A.STORE_NO AS storeNo , A.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo , A.REVIEW_CONTENT AS reviewContent , A.REVIEW_IMG AS reviewImage , A.REVIEW_DATE AS reviewDate , A.REVIEW_SCOPE AS reviewScope , A.USER_NO AS userNo , B.USER_NAME AS userName , B.USER_PROFILE AS userProfile , A.REPORT_COUNT AS reportCount , A.RES_NO AS resNo FROM TBL_REVIEW A JOIN TBL_USER B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE A.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REVIEW_REPORT ( REPORT_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REVIEW_NO , ANS_CONTENT , ANS_TITLE , ANS_DATE , STATE ) VALUES ( #{ reportTitle } , #{ reportContent } , #{ reportDate } , #{ reviewNo } , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , NULL , DEFAULT )
mapper.select:
SELECT INQ_NO AS inquiryNo , INQ_TITLE AS inquiryTitle , INQ_CONTENT AS inquiryContent , INQ_DATE AS inquiryDate , null AS reviewNo , CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo , USER_NO AS userNo , ANS_TITLE AS answerTitle , ANS_CONTENT AS answerContent , ANS_DATE AS answerDate , STATE AS state , FILE AS file , true AS isInquiry FROM TBL_INQUIRY WHERE USER_NO = #{ userNo }
AND (INQ_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%'))

SELECT A.REPORT_NO AS inquiryNo, A.REPORT_TITLE AS inquiryTitle, A.REPORT_CONTENT AS inquiryContent, A.REPORT_DATE AS inquiryDate, B.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, NULL AS categoryNo, NULL AS userNo, A.ANS_TITLE AS answerTitle, A.ANS_CONTENT AS answerContent, A.ANS_DATE AS answerDate, A.STATE AS state, NULL AS file, false AS isInquiry FROM TBL_REVIEW_REPORT A JOIN TBL_REVIEW B ON A.REVIEW_NO = B.REVIEW_NO WHERE B.STORE_NO = #{ storeNo }
AND (REPORT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchWord }, '%'))

SELECT INQ_NO AS inquiryNo , INQ_TITLE AS inquiryTitle , INQ_CONTENT AS inquiryContent , INQ_DATE AS inquiryDate , null AS reviewNo , CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo , USER_NO AS userNo , ANS_TITLE AS answerTitle , ANS_CONTENT AS answerContent , ANS_DATE AS answerDate , STATE AS state , FILE AS file , true AS isInquiry FROM TBL_INQUIRY WHERE USER_NO = #{ userNo }

SELECT A.REPORT_NO AS inquiryNo, A.REPORT_TITLE AS inquiryTitle, A.REPORT_CONTENT AS inquiryContent, A.REPORT_DATE AS inquiryDate, B.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, NULL AS categoryNo, NULL AS userNo, A.ANS_TITLE AS answerTitle, A.ANS_CONTENT AS answerContent, A.ANS_DATE AS answerDate, A.STATE AS state, NULL AS file, false AS isInquiry FROM TBL_REVIEW_REPORT A JOIN TBL_REVIEW B ON A.REVIEW_NO = B.REVIEW_NO WHERE B.STORE_NO = #{ storeNo }
